Security reminderThis studio is for education and experimentation. Do not upload production data or secrets. Outputs are demos; review before using anywhere safety-critical or financial.

1. Choose your front end flavour

Framework

Styling

Component Lego set. Great for rich UIs; mind your state sprawl. Feels instant after first load. Beware over-fetching and giant bundles. Utility-first speed, consistent spacing. Can get noisy without discipline.

2. Layout and components

Folder outline tuned to your choices.

src/
src/components/
src/pages/
src/styles/
src/lib/
src/routes/ or src/router/
src/hooks/

Component checklist

Front end readiness0/100

This will work on your laptop and cry on your first real user.

3. App shell preview

ReactSingle page application
Footer area

Accessibility hints

  • Body text should be at least 16px. If you squint on a phone, bump it.
  • Contrast: text on white/soft backgrounds should read at a glance.
  • Focus: tab through; outlines must stay visible on buttons and links.
